title: How to complete The League in Arc Raiders
summary: Photograph the goals and the magazine kiosk.
body: While Arc Raiders ' other new quests in the Headwinds update have you digging into data and researching scary robots, like With a View or a Prime Specimen , The League quest is much more lighthearted. Apollo wants to set up a football team in the apocalypse, so it's your job to help him. Its four quest steps are much more complicated on paper than in practice. The main hurdle is finding the goals and kiosk you're tasked with photographing, as the Deflated Football and Bicycle Pumps are guaranteed to spawn nearby if you don't already have one in your stash. Where to find the football magazine kiosk and Bicycle Pump Image 1 of 3 (Image credit: Embark) Image 2 of 3 (Image credit: Embark) Image 3 of 3 (Image credit: Embark) You'll find the football magazine kiosk in the small newspaper stand at the north end of Marano Station in northwest Buried City. There are two magazine kiosks at the train station, but only the one to the north is open. Head inside and you'll see the prompt to photograph the kiosk. To grab the Bicycle Pump item, just head outside and interact with the bike against the north wall of the newspaper stand , near the front of the kiosk. This will spawn the Bicycle Pumpโฆ
